Be Natural Organics Algin Acerola Peel-Off Mask

Brand: Be Natural Organics

Category: Mask

Ingredients: Diatomaceous earth, green illite (clay), algin, calcium sufate, malpighia glabra (acerola) fruit extract, maltodextrin, tetrasodium pyrophosphate.
book: 1380-Be Natural Organics Algin Acerola Peel-Off Mask

chunk: Directions: : Empty entire package contents into bowl and add 3 oz of warm water, stirring vigorously for one minute. Immediately apply paste on *cleansed face and neck. For optimal absorption of vitamins and minerals, leave mask on for 20 minutes before peeling off.
